title: Oh My God! The Cast Of FRIENDS Is 'Working On Something' Together And We're Jumping With Joy
text:
Oh My God! The Cast Of FRIENDS Is 'Working On Something' Together And We're Jumping With Joy

Oh My God! The Cast Of FRIENDS Is 'Working On Something' Together And We're Jumping With Joy

FRIENDS isn’t getting old ever! If you have been also been waiting for a reunion and secretly praying that there’s a reboot, your wishes might just come true!

No, we are not kidding!

redbubble.net/

Jennifer Aniston who took the internet by storm after she made her Instagram debut appeared on The Ellen DeGeneres Show. There, she revealed that FRIENDS cast wants to do a reunion and that they are “working on something” together too.

Don’t raise your expectations too high because it won’t be a reboot for sure. “Like a reboot of the show? No.”

“Listen, we would love for there to be something, but we don’t know what that something is. So we’re just trying. We’re working on something.”

Twitter

Don't Miss 564 SHARES 329 SHARES 263 SHARES 1.3 K SHARES

Of course, just like how curious you are, Ellen couldn’t stop herself from asking as to what that would be. "Huge, huge, huge movie," Jennifer joked in response. "No. We don't know."

Twitter

We just saw a reunion picture on Instagram, and our hearts melted. About that, she said, "We did that because we miss each other and we all happened to be in the same part of the world...and maybe..."

This big news made our day.
